description: The round payoff this round was 88. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 44.
Mutual cooperation through choosing Option 1 leads to an equal and fair payoff split, fostering potential trust in repeated games

The game structure creates an incentive for defection (choosing Option 2) to potentially gain a larger individual share, but this risk was not taken in the observed round, suggesting initial caution or cooperation
Repeated rounds with action revelations could lead to strategic adaptation, as players might learn from past outcomes to maximize future payoffs
